body_html:
Self contained repro script:

#include "caffe2/core/workspace.h"
#include "caffe2/core/tensor.h"
#include "caffe2/core/init.h"
int main(int argc, char** argv) {
  caffe2::GlobalInit(&argc, &argv);
  caffe2::Workspace w;
  caffe2::CPUContext ctx;
  auto* w1 = w.CreateBlob("w1")->GetMutable<caffe2::Tensor>();
  auto* w2 = w.CreateBlob("w2")->GetMutable<caffe2::Tensor>();
  auto t1 = caffe2::Tensor({2,2}, std::vector<float>{1,2,3,4}, &ctx);
  auto t2 = caffe2::Tensor({2,2}, std::vector<float>{5,6,7,8}, &ctx);
  w1->CopyFrom(t1); 
  w2->CopyFrom(t2);
  LOG(INFO) << *w1->data<float>();
}
